== What is !WikiEvidens? ==

*!WikiEvidens* is a visualization and statistical tool for wikis. It is in planning stage. Stay tuned.

== Features ==

  * Wiki datasets downloader
  * Wiki XML preprocessor
  * Global, page-by-page, user-by-user and sample analysis
    * Summary
    * Activity by year, month, day of week, hour
  * Export in several formats

== Install ==

  * Requirements: python, python-tk, python-sqlite, python-matplotlib (optional: python-nltk, graphviz)
